story.title: Ivy Saves the Tree House
story.summary: A young girl named Ivy discovers that a celebration needs saving in the tree house. With help from a robot buddy and a sun crystal, they embark on an adventure to save the day.
scenes: young girl Ivy arriving at the tree house for the first time
Ivy noticing that a celebration needs saving
Ivy meeting a robot buddy who explains the problem
The robot buddy telling Ivy about the legendary sun crystal
Ivy and the robot buddy deciding to work together
Ivy and the robot buddy exploring the depths of the tree house
Discovering clues about where to find the sun crystal
Ivy solving a puzzle using clever thinking in the tree house
The robot buddy protecting Ivy from danger
Finding a secret passage in the tree house
Meeting others affected by the problem: a celebration needs saving
Ivy rallying everyone to help solve the crisis
Finally finding the sun crystal in a hidden location
Learning how to use the sun crystal properly
The robot buddy showing unexpected courage
Ivy using the sun crystal to fix the problem: a celebration needs saving
The tree house being restored to its former glory
Everyone celebrating Ivy and the robot buddy as heroes
Ivy saying goodbye to the robot buddy but promising to return
The tree house now peaceful with Ivy as its protector

art_style.name: Manga
art_style.coloring_style: manga style black and white line art, clean sharp lines, high contrast
art_style.cover_style: manga anime style with vibrant colors, professional cover art
art_style.complexity: detailed clean line art with expressive characters
